private_settings.title: Oauth
private_settings.description: On the authentication screen, log into Pipedrive with your username and password, if you are not already logged in

settings_sections.title: Connect with Pipedrive
settings_sections.description: Please begin by authenticating this connector with Pipedrive. You must have appropriate privileges to grant access. Hull accesses to only the endpoint required to do User and Account synchronization

settings_sections.title: User - Fetching from Pipedrive
settings_sections.description:
Hull gives its customers the ability to capture a subset of user fields in order to have fine grain control over the dataflow. Please configure the fields that you would like pulled from Pipedrive below.

Add a mapping by clicking "Map an attribute". To create a new attribute in Hull, you may type in the attribute name in the "Hull Attribute" box on the right and hit enter to create a new attribute.
